title: Fix Date of Birth field population from Quick Fill text

requirements.summary: Fix parseStructuredText function to correctly extract and populate Date of Birth field from Quick Fill with support for DOB labels and multiple date formats (ISO, US, EU)
acceptanceCriteria: When Quick Fill text contains 'DOB: 2020-05-15', the Date of Birth field populates with '2020-05-15'
When Quick Fill text contains 'Date of Birth: 05/15/2020', the Date of Birth field populates correctly
When Quick Fill text contains 'Birthday: 15/05/2020', the Date of Birth field populates correctly
The Date of Birth field updates immediately when Quick Fill is triggered
Other fields continue to populate correctly from Quick Fill without regression

file_operations.description: Add date of birth parsing logic to the parseStructuredText function. Recognize labels 'DOB', 'Date of Birth', 'Birth Date', and 'Birthday' (case-insensitive). Extract the date value and use the existing parseDate function from validation.ts to handle ISO (YYYY-MM-DD), US (MM/DD/YYYY), and EU (DD/MM/YYYY) formats. Set the parsed date to result.dateOfBirth when found. Ensure existing field parsing logic remains unchanged.
